EmailTemplate.name: LBW Auto-Repsonder
EmailTemplate.subject: We'll Be In Touch Soon
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Thanks for contacting LBW Customer Service! We received your message and look forward to assisting you as soon as possible.
It won’t take us longer than a business day, but if you need more immediate support you can always call us at (888) 599-2656. The team’s here Monday through Friday, from 9am to 6pm EST. We look forward to assisting you.
Leads by Web Customer Service (888) 599-2656 LBWCustomerService@web.com
{!Case.Thread_Id}
